t: Watch Mr. Bean: The Animated Series | Prime Video
s: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he can't. Next morning, and after an awful night's sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive.

t: Watch Mr Bean in Handy Bean | Prime Video
s: Mr Bean cooks, creates, packs and paints in this new series. From chocolate on pizza to painting the mono-brow Lisa - sorry, we mean the Mona Lisa! Watch Bean bumble through three bean salads (not what you're thinking) and birthday cakes (his own, obviously)... what could possibly go wrong?

t: Watch Mr. Bean's Holiday | Prime Video
s: When London's wet weather becomes too much to bear, pratfall-prone Mr. Bean (Rowan Atkinson) heads to the French Riviera for some fun in the sun.
